languages.text: "Тебе не кажется, что в этой истории много несостыковок? Может, это не мой безумно хитрый план, а меня впутали в чью-то махинацию".

"Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"
languages.original_text: "Тебе не кажется, что в этой истории много несостыковок? Может, это не мой безумно хитрый план, а меня впутали в чью-то махинацию".

traits.locale_text: "Don't you think there are a lot of inconsistencies in this story? What if this mess is not an insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

"Don't you think there are a lot of inconsistencies in this story? What if this mess is not an insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

"Don't you find there are rather a lot of inconsistencies in this story? What if this mess is not, in fact, some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

"Don't you find there are rather a lot of inconsistencies in this story? What if this mess is not, in fact, some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

"Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

"Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

languages.text: «¿No le parece que hay demasiadas inconsistencias en esta historia? ¿Y si esta situación no fuera realmente una elaborada intriga por mi parte? ¿Ha considerado la posibilidad de que alguien me haya manipulado para sus propios propósitos?».
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No le parece que hay demasiadas inconsistencias en esta historia? ¿Y si esta situación no fuera realmente una elaborada intriga por mi parte? ¿Ha considerado la posibilidad de que alguien me haya manipulado para sus propios propósitos?».

languages.text: “你这种假设，自相矛盾的地方太多了，难道你看不出来吗？如果事实并不像你想的这样呢？如果我根本没策划过什么疯狂的阴谋诡计呢？你有没有想过，说不定我也被卷入了其他人的阴谋之中？”
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: “你这种假设，自相矛盾的地方太多了，难道你看不出来吗？如果事实并不像你想的这样呢？如果我根本没策划过什么疯狂的阴谋诡计呢？你有没有想过，说不定我也被卷入了其他人的阴谋之中？”

languages.text: 「この状況には一貫性がなさ過ぎると思わないか？もしこの状況が実際に{mf|俺|私}の悪巧みでない場合どうする？{mf|俺|私}が何者かの謀略に偶然巻き込まれている可能性を考えたのか？」
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: 「この状況には一貫性がなさ過ぎると思わないか？もしこの状況が実際に{mf|俺|私}の悪巧みでない場合どうする？{mf|俺|私}が何者かの謀略に偶然巻き込まれている可能性を考えたのか？」

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas l'impression que cette histoire ne tient pas debout ? Avez-vous songé que la situation actuelle n'est peut-être pas le résultat d'une folle machination de mon invention ? Que je puisse avoir été {mf|embarqué|embarquée} malgré moi dans les manigances d'un tiers ? »
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas l'impression que cette histoire ne tient pas debout ? Avez-vous songé que la situation actuelle n'est peut-être pas le résultat d'une folle machination de mon invention ? Que je puisse avoir été {mf|embarqué|embarquée} malgré moi dans les manigances d'un tiers ? »

languages.text: "Bu hikâyede çok fazla tutarsızlık olduğunu görmüyor musun? Ya bu durum aslında benim şeytani derecede kurnaz bir planımın sonucu değilse? Farkında olmadan başkasının oyununa dâhil olmuş olabileceğim aklına gelmedi mi?"
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu hikâyede çok fazla tutarsızlık olduğunu görmüyor musun? Ya bu durum aslında benim şeytani derecede kurnaz bir planımın sonucu değilse? Farkında olmadan başkasının oyununa dâhil olmuş olabileceğim aklına gelmedi mi?"

languages.text: "Findet Ihr nicht, dass diese Geschichte zu viele Ungereimtheiten aufweist? Was, wenn diese Situation nicht das Ergebnis eines unfassbar teuflischen Plans von mir ist? Habt Ihr Euch schon mal überlegt, dass ich selbst das Opfer einer Intrige sein könnte?"
languages.original_text: "Don't you find that there are too many inconsistencies in this story? What if this situation is not, in fact, the result of some insanely devious plan of mine? Have you considered that I may have been unwittingly involved in someone else's scheme?"

traits.locale_text: "Findet Ihr nicht, dass diese Geschichte zu viele Ungereimtheiten aufweist? Was, wenn diese Situation nicht das Ergebnis eines unfassbar teuflischen Plans von mir ist? Habt Ihr Euch schon mal überlegt, dass ich selbst das Opfer einer Intrige sein könnte?"
